Html:
Hey, this may be a really noob question but i dont know what else to do,

i have absolutely no idea about c++ and im trying to create markers so i can track with the example #8 in goblin 3.5, Anyway the only thing that samplemarkercreator does (from ALVAR) is create a .png file, how do i use that with the example #8?? 

i dont know if im doing this right, can anybody just point in the right direction please, how can i create markers that i can actually track in goblin 3.5 (i suppose its an .xml file or a .txt like in the example but how do i generate those) 

 

thanks in advance

The generated .png files are used by MarkerLayout program in the /tools directory. 

You need to use MarkerLayout (or manually) to create the .xml or .txt configuration file.

Once you have the generated layout image and .xml or .txt configuration file, you can use it with tutorial 8.

Ohan
